prod_desc: Fly in and save the stranded sailor before he floats away!
prod_long_desc:
Be part of the brave crew of the LEGO® City coast guard in the Sea Rescue Plane, featuring spinning propellers, an opening cockpit, lowering back ramp and space for the included rescue water scooter, plus a rescue raft and rescue light. Includes 2 minifigures.
Includes 2 minifigures: a rescue plane pilot and a sailor.
Features a rescue plane with spinning rotors, pontoons, opening minifigure cockpit, back ramp that lowers with space inside the plane for the included 2-minifigure rescue water scooter.
Also includes a rescue raft with space for a minifigure.
Spin the rotors to take off and head out to search for the missing sailor.
Pretend to shine the rescue light from the raft to catch the pilot’s attention in the plane.
Land the plane, open the back hatch and hop on the water scooter to rescue the stranded sailor.
Includes a rescue light accessory element.
Rescue plane measures over 3” high, 8” long and 9” wide.
Rescue raft measures over 1” high, 2” long and 1” wide.
Rescue water scooter measures over 2” long, 1” wide and under 1” high.
